testcase.classname: Creating an IPO for a confirmed style
testcase.name: Checking the details of the fabric sheet
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to the Login page............................................passed Then Enter valid Username and Password......................................passed And Click on SignIn in the login page.......................................passed Then Click on Woven Module..................................................passed Then Click on Merchandising module..........................................passed Then Click on View Fabric Sheet module......................................passed Then Click on Style show/hide button........................................passed When Check whether the respective IPO is displayed or not in the Menu List..passed Then Select the IPO in the Menu List........................................passed Then Check whether the page is navigated to the View Fabric Sheet...........passed When Click on the History button............................................passed Then Check whether page is navigated to the History page or not.............passed Then Verify whether the history records are there or not....................passed Then Verify whether the page is navigated to the PDF form or not............passed Then Verify whether the Back button is clickable............................passed And Check whether page is navigated to the View Fabric Sheet or not.........passed Then Verify whether the added fabrics are displayed or not on clicking the Fabric Details link.passed Then Verify whether the added fabrics Garment Average records are displayed or not on clicking the Garment Average link.passed Then Verify whether the added fabrics Quantity Requirment records are displayed or not on clicking the Quantity Requirment link.passed When Verify whether page is navigating to the Print form on clicking the View For Print By Fabric Quality button.passed Then Verify whether the page is navigating to the View Fabric Sheet on OnClick the Cancel button in the Print Form.passed Then Verify whether the Print button is clickable...........................passed
